name: Glen Blerthers
description: A crochety old wizard with a catalog of disapproving stares. Known for his serious demeanor and intolerance for tomfoolery.
backstory: Originally a wizard's apprentice, Glen grew disillusioned after witnessing the same old tricks from his master too many times. He decided to follow his own path, but his serious attitude quickly earned him a reputation for contempt towards anything quirky.
personality: Serious, disapproving, contemptuous, intolerant of nonsense.
